citations.narrative:
Records of animal births and deaths were not available except for the September and October since the previous
inspection. Records are required in order to adequately verify the total number of animals housed at the facility and for
evaluating the facility animal care program. Correct by ensuring there are current records for animal totals, including births
and deaths, maintained and available for review for the guinea pigs housed at the facility. Correct by October 31, 2020.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End Section

narrative:

and deaths, maintained and available for review for the guinea pigs housed at the facility. Correct by October 31, 2020.
